short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to identify clickbait

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension uses Neural Net to predict and indicate clickbait articles on Facebook. Unlike other clickbait extensions, Clickmate is non intrusive. It blocks the visibility of the articles marked as clickbait while still allowing you to see it if you place the cursor on the article.
